results.stimulus:
Alternative Uses Task

In this task, you need to come up with alternative uses for a common object.

When you begin the task, the name of the common object will appear at the top of the screen. Please enter all of the alternative uses you can think of for the object in the text box below, separated by commas. You will have one minute to list all of the uses you can think of.

Be inventive and try to think of a diverse range of unusual uses that the object would be appropriate for. You don't have to write in full sentences, just give enough information to make it clear what the intended use is.

Press the spacebar to continue to an example.

Example

For example, if the object was 'a brick', you might enter the following uses in the textbox like so:

A Brick

Time Remaining:1:00

Your time will start on the next page. Press the spacebar to begin.

results.responses: {"au-response":"opening iphone, making holes in clingfilm, scratching wood, skewering rice, making ornaments, cleaning nails, ","au-response-hidden":""}
results.response: opening iphone, making holes in clingfilm, scratching wood, skewering rice, making ornaments, cleaning nails,

results.stimulus:
Segment Complete

That concludes this segment of the experiment. Press the spacebar to continue to the next segment.
